item.title: Branding Notepad
item.dc:creator: GHSC Security
item.description:
It will appeal to anyone who chooses elegant things.
Inner block: cream offset paper 70 g/m².
Line: unlined.
Sheets: 96.

The post Branding Notepad first appeared on GHSC Security.
item.content:encoded:
Business notepad for documents. Lightweight and high-quality polypropylene is the ideal protection for papers. Its color matches any professional style. The notepad features a gray soft-touch cover that has an ultra-smooth finish.

The post Branding Notepad first appeared on GHSC Security.

item.title: Business Folder
item.dc:creator: GHSC Security
item.description:
The stylish and modern plastic folder is made of high-quality hard two-layer plastic, 600 microns thick. Thanks to the design, the documents are kept in their original form (like new). The folder in black color will emphasize your style. It has an inner corner pocket for documents.

The post Business Folder first appeared on GHSC Security.
item.content:encoded:
This folder is a great tool for organizing documents and contains up to 100 A4 sheets.

The post Business Folder first appeared on GHSC Security.

item.title: Business Diary
item.dc:creator: GHSC Security
item.description:
This stylish diary was created for those who appreciate corporate style. Every detail of the diary sets you up for successful planning and efficient work. The information block is presented in English. A convenient format allows you to keep an eye on all important events and focus on priority tasks. Strong hardcover — strict, practical, and perfectly keeps its shape.

The post Business Diary first appeared on GHSC Security.
item.content:encoded:
Smooth cream paper with a density of 80 g/m2, dated model. Size: 21 x 26 cm.

The post Business Diary first appeared on GHSC Security.

item.title: Leather Notebook
item.dc:creator: GHSC Security
item.description:
A leather notebook is an original and stylish assistant in the daily life of every modern person. Thanks to the rich leather texture of the cover, the unique details of the finish, and the exclusive color, it is perceived as a stylish accessory. It will appeal to anyone who chooses elegant things.

The post Leather Notebook first appeared on GHSC Security.
item.content:encoded:
Inner block: cream offset paper 70 g/m².
Line: unlined.
Sheets: 96.

The post Leather Notebook first appeared on GHSC Security.
